AAV.caption: has finished playing
AAV.doc: Triggers once the audio file playback ends
AAV.name: on_end

AAH.caption: Sound File
AAH.doc: Your sound file. Supports all browser-ready files: MP3, MPEG, OPUS, OGG, OGA, WAV, AAC, CAF, M4A, MP4, WEBA, WEBM, DOLBY, FLAC.
AAH.name: sound_file

AAJ.caption: Preload
AAJ.doc: Check to automatically begin downloading the sound file when the page loads
AAJ.name: preload_bool

AAK.caption: Loop
AAK.doc: Loop the sound file when it finishes playing
AAK.name: loop_bool

AAL.caption: Force HTML5 Audio
AAL.doc: Check to force HTML5 Audio. This should be used for large audio files so that you don't have to wait for the full file to be downloaded and decoded before playing. Disable it for greater browser compatibility.
AAL.name: html5_bool

AAM.caption: Playback rate
AAM.doc: The rate of playback. 0.5 to 4.0, with 1.0 being normal speed.
AAM.name: playback_rate

AAN.caption: Volume
AAN.doc: The volume of the track, from 0.0 to 1.0.
AAN.name: volume
